attributes.action: Allow lorries and public transport to use red diesel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the increase of the price of diesel. The govt should allow lorries and public transport to run on red diesel. This will benefical to the companies that operate the above and customers (ie supermarkets). With the bad weather we had this year, some products have increased 2.5 times in price. With the increase in fuel price, the companies feel the need to pass on the cost to us.
